General.Name: Zhejiang Fulai New Material Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Fulai New Materials Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells functional coating composite products. It provides advertising inkjet printing, label printing, and other electronic-grade functional materials. The company also offers water-based series, eco-solvent series, laminating series, and other advertising inkjet printing materials; and PP, PET, BOPP, and other label printing materials, as well as tapes, protective films, release films. In addition, it provides display, adhesive, RC, lamp, photo paper, pagewide, and flame retardant series; and inject, digital, metallized, tag business leaflet/card/tag, and special series, as well as basic membrane. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Jiashan, China.
